Three identical conducting spheres are on insulating stands, as shown in the figure. The spheres are far enough apart that they have no effect on each other when they are at the positions shown. Initially, the spheres have the charges indicated in the figure.
In Process <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, Sphere <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> is moved toward and briefly touches Sphere <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>, then moved toward and briefly touches Sphere <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></math>, and finally returned to its initial position. After Process <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> the charge on Sphere <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> is <math alttext="Q sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>. In Process <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> the spheres are given the same initial charge values indicated in the figure. Sphere <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> is moved toward and briefly touches Sphere <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></math>, then moved toward and briefly touches Sphere <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>, and is again returned to its initial position. After Process <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> the charge on Sphere <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> is <math alttext="Q sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>. Which of the following relations for <math alttext="Q sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="Q sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> is correct?

<math alttext="Q sub 2 is greater than Q sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>
